title: Next Xbox: Streaming Scarlett? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.23.18
description:
Start your trial month for $5 today at http://forhims.com/gamesdaily
Thanks to MeUndies for sponsoring this episode. Get 15% off your first pair at http://meundies.com/gamesdaily
Tim and Greg dive into the rumors about the next Xbox being two SKUs -- one that just streams!

00:03:05 - Housekeeping
 Party Mode Week! Might I suggest:
Kinda Funny Plays ROCKET LEAGUE! - Party Mode - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NL0CLyudo9s
 Kinda Funny Plays ROCKET LEAGUE! - Party Mode - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KEKLt0X4IFM
Kinda Funny Summer Break Next Week: No KFMS or KFGD
The Roper Report   -
00:05:02 - Next Xbox Rumors, Brad Sams at Thurrott
00:22:28 - Rocket League Drop Rates, Psyonix
00:23:25 - Fallout 76 Beta Deets, Bethesda
00:21:14 - 2018 has highest game completion rating of PS Vita's lifespan, Rebekah Valentine GIB
00:26:15 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:38:00 - I'm assuming y'all have played Smash Bros by now. How does it feel playing with the joycons? - Mitch Krassin
00:40:55 - Have you noticed a shift towards games at this years Comic-Con? or are games still predominantly secondary to comics, movies, and tv shows? - WhyNotPete
00:45:45 - Do you this the Spider-Man PS4 pro will have a more difficult time selling with the rumors flying of a new console in the next year or two? - Alex Hackney
00:49:28 - I picked up The Crew 2 over the weekend. As a avid trophy hunter, my first port of call was to check the trophy list, check for a guide and how active the communities are on psnprofiles or other such sites. Wow I’m shocked, this game has been out for less than a month and there seems to barely be a pulse. Do you think this is down to the game not being received well as well as the original, launched at a poor time of the year (right around E3) or there are just too many games community / live games for people to participate in these days? - Luke
00:53:30 - Squad Up: Mikey Van(Xbox One) - Vanhhh
00:54:42 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host:
Tuesday: Andrea
Wednesday: Whita
Thursday: Jaered
Friday: Tim

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
